price: Enti Adam nyaa nsεm bi fri ne Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ (desrεε bͻnefakyε). Enti (Nyankopͻn) tiee (Adam) adwen sakra no, εna Ɔde ne bͻne kyεε no. Nokorε sε, Ɔno na Otie adwen sakra, na Ɔne Mmͻborͻhunufoͻ Hene no.
arabic: فَتَلَقَّىٰٓ ءَادَمُ مِن رَّبِّهِۦ كَلِمَٰتٖ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fatalaqqā ādamu min rabbihi kalimātin fatāba ʿalayhi innahu huwa al-tawābu al-raḥīmu
